1552.content:
You arrive at Josh's house, stoked for the spring break! Three whole weeks without parents! This was going to be the BEST! Arriving at the door, you rang the bell and waited anxiously. When Josh got to the door, you instantly noticed that he looked a little distressed, but upon seeing you that went away, the look replaced with... Was that... Mischief? Whatever it was, it worried you slightly, but not enough to stop you from being STOKED!

"Dude! Come in! This is going to be awesome!"

"Yeah!" you replied, "I can't believe our parents are letting me stay here though! Your house is awesome man!"

"Hell yeah it is, and we're going to start by playing some Generic Sports Game 2K(Current Year)!"

"AWESOME!"

Josh's parents were more successful than your parents, and had a massive house. It had something like 8 bathrooms! Josh always had the latest game, and you were always excited to come over and be able to play it. The two of you quickly threw your clothes into the spare room, and then ran through the massive halls to the games room, where you excitedly booted the Company™ GameConsole™ and started playing. Josh, seeing as he actually owned the game, was a lot better than you at first, but after a couple rounds you started to get way better. After a few hours of playing, Josh decided he wanted some food, so he left to the kitchen to get some snacks. While he was away, you realized how much you needed the bathroom. No problem! This place was M A S S I V E, so finding one shouldn't be hard, or so you thought....

The first bathroom you found was directly across the hall from the games room, and upon entering you were immediately hit by the absolute worst stench you had ever smelled! It was RANK! Opening the toilet, you found it piled right up to the lid with Josh's shit. Disgusted, you tried flushing it down, to no avail. Shrugging your shoulders like an idiot who's only doing actions to fill space in a story, you got up and went searching for another bathroom, undaunted.

The second bathroom you came across was the one attached to your bedroom, and you threw the door open only for yet another wave of the HORRIBLE stench to hit you. Damn, did Josh destroy both of these? And the one in your room too! Starting to be slightly worried, you ran back to Josh's room to find that his bathroom was ALSO clogged. How much did Josh shit? You knew he was overweight and ate a lot, but you never really gave thought to how much he shit. Thinking to yourself, he DID have to leave class to go to the bathroom a lot, but in school there were dozens of toilets, so Josh's giant shits were never a problem.

Running downstairs into the great hall, you booked it into the kitchen where Josh was microwaving Popcorn.

"Hey, where's the bathroom?" you asked

"Uhhh..." Josh replied, looking down, "Try the one in the basement? You know where the Library is, right?"

"I think so?"

"Well, good luck finding it man." Said Josh in an oddly panicked way

Thinking that Josh was acting a bit strange, you went down to the Basement bathroom to find that it too was haunted by the shits of Josh's past! You then started running around the place checking every single bathroom you could find, but ALL OF THEM had clogged toilets! In the end, you gave up and sat on one of the toilets on the main floor, and shat on top of Josh's. What little room had remained in the toilet was now gone. Relieved, you got up and walked to the kitchen, expecting to see Josh, but instead you found that he had abandoned what he was doing completely! The microwave was even still beeping! Strange, you thought, walking back up the stairs towards the games room, wanting to question Josh immediately as to why he was acting so weirdly. When you entered the room, something immediately shot out and covered your mouth! You tried to struggle, but within seconds you were down and out.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
~~~~Knocked Out Noises~~~~
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

When you came too, the first thing you noticed was that you couldn't move your arms! You tried standing only to notice that you couldn't do that either! You struggled until you got tired, but it was no use. The bonds seemed like they were impossible to escape! On top of that, you didn't even know where you were. The room you were in was dark, had no windows, and had only a couple metal rungs on the floor and walls, which you were tied too. There was also a mattress, which you were lying on, and what looked like a weird chair in the corner, with some sort of ring sitting on the seat? You couldn't figure out what it was for. Suddenly, you could hear beeping noises, and then a section of the wall slid away to reveal Josh!

"Josh! What the shit!"

'John look, I'm really sorry, but you saw the toilets! All of them are plugged already, and it's only been two days since my parents left, you know they had to leave before your parents."

"Ok, one, what do the toilets have to do with anything, and two, WHY AM I TIED DOWN, AND WHERE AM I?"

"Well, you know the library right? Well, I was messing around in there one day and found a secret room! Behind it was three doors with keypads, and the codes were just written next to them! I don't even think my parents know about what's down here, so I decided to use them as my own secret rooms!"

"Ok, that was the least important question but sure take your time" you replied, annoyed

Josh stood up and smacked your face, hard

"You don't get it do you. I'm not your friend. I never liked you. If our parents weren't such good friends I would never talk to you. And now, I don't have to. When the last toilet got plugged, I decided I was going to make YOU my toilet! You're going to eat my massive shits, whether you like it or not, shitlord!"

You started to panic, Josh was going to make you his toilet? No, that couldn't be. He wouldn't do that... But would he? You started yelling as loud as you could

"Oh can it, nobody can hear you. We're way too far underground. And anyways, I have something to make you cooperate. I've been saving this, and let me tell you, it is GOOD!" he said, pulling his phone out of his pocket and showing you a video

Oh no. It's a video of you trying on your moms panties and singing! You hadn't even thought that someone might be looking in the window, if this got out, your life would be ruined!

"Oh yes John. If you don't do exactly as I say, I will ruin you. Now, you better open that mouth wide and let me put this brace in it." He said, holding a strange ring.

You opened your mouth, and Josh placed the ring inside. With it like this, you couldn't close your mouth! Josh then smiled and pressed a button on his phone, and suddenly you could move your mouth again.

"Just something to make sure you can both accept my shit AND chew it! I've been planning this for a while. That's why I was so worried when you arrived, I hadn't got the mattress in here yet!" He laughed, obviously enjoying the situation. Next, he moved the weird chair, which had a toilet seat on it, over top of your head. You were truly ready to be his toilet now, and nothing you can do will change that. The next three weeks were going to be shit.
